EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI Luncheon_Q414.06 Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re sorry you couldn’t attend the Pivotal FSI Executive Luncheon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html> We’re sorry you couldn’t attend
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for registering for our Pivotal Financial Services and Insurance Executive Luncheon. We are sorry you couldn’t attend.
Please find attached a copy of a whitepaper that Pivotal and Cap Gemini have produced around the Principles of the Business Data Lake <http://www.pivotal.io/sites/default/files/The_Principles_of_the_Business_Data_Lake_2013-12-02_V07_WEB.pdf>
If you would like to know more about Pivotal, you might like to subscribe to our blog: http://blog.pivotal.io/ <http://blog.pivotal.io/>
